title: The lasting of us...tech professionals of the future
description: Are Tech Professionals still in high demand? Recent market trends suggest otherwise. International giants like Google, Amazon, and Facebook have been laying off thousands of software developers, indicating a possible shift in the demand for tech professionals. What does this mean for the future of tech jobs? Will the skills in demand evolve? We are now entering an era where only the highly adaptable and constantly evolving tech professionals will be the lasting of us.
